original_text: The Lord had made the Egyptians favorably disposed toward the people, and they gave them what they asked for; so they plundered the Egyptians.
korean_text: 여호와께서 애굽 사람들에게 이스라엘 백성에게 은혜를 입히게 하사 그들이 구하는 대로 주게 하시므로 그들이 애굽 사람의 물품을 취하였더라

sentences.original_text: The Lord had made the Egyptians
and they gave them what they asked for
